info.description: Code understanding platform with hybrid search and LLM-powered enrichments
info.title: Kodit API

post.description: Add a new Git repository to track

get.description: Returns raw file content from a Git repository at a given blob reference (commit SHA, tag, or branch)

parameters.description: Commit SHA, tag name, or branch name
parameters.name: blob_name

parameters.description: Prefix each line with its 1-based line number
parameters.name: line_numbers

get.description: This endpoint has been removed. Embeddings are an internal detail of snippets and enrichments.

delete.description: Delete all enrichments for a commit

get.description: Get an enrichment by ID within commit context

delete.description: Delete a specific enrichment from a commit

get.description: Get a file by blob SHA

post.description: Trigger a rescan of a specific commit

get.description: List code snippets for a commit (backed by enrichments)
List recent enrichments across commits for a repository
Get indexing task status for a repository
Get aggregated indexing status summary for a repository

post.description: Trigger a sync (git fetch + branch scan + commit indexing) for a repository

get.description: Get current tracking configuration for a repository

put.description: Update tracking configuration for a repository

post.description: Hybrid search across code snippets and enrichments
